## The Data

Weather data was collected from *NNDC Climate Data Online* 
https://www7.ncdc.noaa.gov/CDO/cdopoemain.cmd

Location: Bowman Field, Louisville KY

WBAN (ID): 13810

Start Date: Jan 01, 1988

End Date: December 31, 2017
